title: Tittle
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020061720/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020061720/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Tittle**

A tittle is the dot on the i or j.

**Discussion:**  
 [What's That Dot?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020061720/http:/typophile.com/node/28757)
